title: Inconsistant datatypes
body:
by **linuxhacker100**: 
What is the problem?

time.Nanoseconds() returns int64
os.Dir.Mtime_ns is uint64

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

I would expect that all of the standard go libraries would use the same
type to represent the same type of data.

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
AMD64 Linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
3887d4d81bca tip

Please provide any additional information below.

This is not too important. But you should not need to caste to manipulate
the same type of data.
